  theme(
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),

```{r}
gammas <- multimodal_gammas(100, c(3, 3),c(3, 3), k_shared = 4, alpha_shared = 3)
map(gammas, head)
```

```{r}
V <- 50
betas <- map(gammas, ~ rdirichlet(ncol(.), rep(1, V)))
x <- map(seq_along(gammas), ~ simulate_lda(betas[[.]], gammas[[.]]))
fits <- map(x, ~ LDA(x = ., k = 7))
```

```{r}
t(fits[[1]]@gamma) %*% fits[[2]]@gamma
```

```{r, fig.height = 6, fig.width = 6}
masses <- map(list(fits[[1]]@gamma, fits[[2]]@gamma), ~ as_tibble(.)) %>%
  bind_rows(.id = "m") %>%
  pivot_longer(-m, names_to = "k_LDA", values_to = "g") %>%
  mutate(
    k_LDA = str_replace(k_LDA, "V", "")
  )

masses <- .topic_weights(masses)
gamma_hats <- map(list(fits[[1]]@gamma, fits[[2]]@gamma), ~ as_tibble(t(.)))
weights <- .beta_weights(gamma_hats, masses)
ggplot(weights, aes(k, k_next)) +
  geom_tile(aes(fill = weight)) +
  scale_fill_distiller(direction = 1) +
  coord_fixed()
```
